summary: Defines the core components of the BiPointNet2 architecture for processing 3D point clouds, including hierarchical set abstraction, convolution‑style feature aggregation, and a single‑scale grouping classifier, built with PyTorch and DGL.
business_intent: Enables developers to train and deploy deep learning models that recognize and classify objects from raw point‑cloud data, supporting use cases such as autonomous vehicle perception, robotics navigation, and 3D scene understanding.
